Package org.settings4j.settings

Class Summary
DefaultFilter The Default Implementation uses the RegEx-Pattern Expressions to evaluate the includes and excludes.
DefaultSettings The default Settings Object.
DefaultSettingsFactory This default Factory uses the DefaultSettings Implementation.
DefaultSettingsRepository This class is specialized in retrieving settings by name and also maintaining the settings hierarchy.
SettingsManager managed The Settings4jRepository .
